products.title: Eco Friendly Fr Grey Recycled Electric Roller Blind
products.description: Their eco-friendly, recycled electric roller blinds are made from 100% pet recycled waste. This means that you can decorate your window with your new sustainable blind, and contribute positively to the environment. For every sq. Metre of fabric, 9 pet bottles are used, so you'll be positively contributing to the fight on plastic pollution, as well as getting a stylish blind. Made with a moisture-resistant and flame-retardant coating, your new grey electric roller blind can be just the thing to complete your bathroom or kitchen.
